flawed_nl_solution:
1 hour = <<60=60>>60 minutes.
We convert the time to hours, so 42 minutes = 42/60 hours = 7/11 hours.
So in 42 minutes, the distance the bus traveled in miles is 50 * (7/11) = <<50*(7/11)=350/11>>350/11 miles.
#### 350/11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 42/60, not 7/11. It appears there was an off-by-one error in the fraction.
